scripts.say: Nagato, I hope you've been well.
Amagi. What would you request of me?
If you pardon my rudeness, I would like to make a request on behalf of Kaga.
Very well. Speak.
As you know, the treaty allows any two large capitol ships to be converted to aircraft carriers. I seek to rescind the decommissioning of Battleship Kaga based upon the Treaty's demands.
Hmm... Amagi, nobody wishes for this outcome, but the Treaty is binding once signed. Your request would be three ships... Unless...
Unless someone takes her place, correct?
From the very beginning, the world has never judged who is weak or strong. You are just using that as an excuse to escape from reality.
Nagato, you should already know that I am not fit to serve as the flagship of the Combined Fleet. Sooner or later, the role must be entrusted to someone else.
While she may not be up to the task just yet, if you were to pass on the role to Kaga, I would be able to rest easy knowing that I was able to serve the Sakura Empire, even with this flawed body.
Is this truly what you desire?
Without a doubt. Right now, Kaga is alone in the Mirror Sea due to her despair, but I will personally bring her back.
Should we be able to return safely, I humbly request that you consider my decision, and hold another wargame to see that Kaga can become an aircraft carrier.
Thank you for entertaining my selfish requests, but this is my... *cough* *cough*...
It can't be...
Understood, speak no more. Your request shall be granted.
Thank you for your graciousness, Nagato...
I have already asked Houshou to train the two of them in aviation techniques.
Those two have the strength and talent to become the core of the Combined Fleet. Please rest assured, Nagato.
I shall pray for your safe return.
Thank you very much. I am sorry for troubling you.
